plot: Two Israeli brothers encounter a Palestinian boy. A fight ensues, resulting in a broken leg. The histories, sentiments, and divisions of the families surface from the boys' memories, and in their discordant approaches to the situation.
title: Daily Bread
plot_es: Two Israeli brothers encounter a Palestinian boy. A fight ensues, resulting in a broken leg. The histories, sentiments, and divisions of the families surface from the boys' memories, and in their discordant approaches to the situation.
